description: A vulnerability was found in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0. It has been rated as critical. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /view/student_grade_wise.php. The manipulation of the argument grade leads to sql injection. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. VDB-265094 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.
